init_hook:
echo "━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━"
echo "  Initializing Devbox: Go"
echo "━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━"

echo " ➜ GOPATH: $GOPATH"
echo " ➜ GO_VERSION: $(go version)"

echo " ➜ Create GOPATH directory"
mkdir -p "$GOPATH"
mkdir -p "$GOPATH/bin"
